title: Restoring SMS messages which didn't make the 25 MB mark in the backup.
content:
So, before doing a factory reset, I made sure to back up the phone. The backup and syncs were successful. But, many of the SMS messages didn't make the 25 MB mark.
To me, that means that it wasn't successful. It should have at least told me that it didn't back everything up.
in any event, is there per chance some other way of restoring the rest of the SMS messages? I'm on AT&t if that makes a difference.
